MS MCQs

    Introduction to Power Platform developer resources

    »

    1. Your organization is considering options on how to build an enterprise application with a robust data model. Which of the following would be a good fit for this scenario?

      Azure SQL

      PowerApp (Model-driven app)

      PowerApp (Canvas app)


    2. Which of the following are components of the Power Platform?

      Azure Functions, SharePoint, virtual machines

      Power Apps, HDInsight, Power Automate

      SharePoint, Power Apps, Power Automate

      Power Apps, Power BI, Power Automate


    3. Which of the following is a benefit of developing against the Dataverse?

      Provides the ability to quickly build apps without the need for writing code

      Provides the ability to translate data into different languages automatically
